author: Special Correspondent
text:
Three persons, including a four-year-old boy, were killed and seven others injured when a car hit median on Tiruchi-Thanjavur highway at Tiruverumbur near here on Monday.

Sources said there 10 people travelling by the car when the accident occurred. The occupants, belonging to Veerappan Chathiram in Erode district, were returning home after taking part in the Mahamaham festival in Kumbakonam.

The names of the dead were given as T. Chinthamani (60), D. Jayankani (4), and A. Alagarsamy (55). While Chinthamani died on the spot, Jayankani was brought dead to the Mahatma Gandhi Memorial Government Hospital. Alagarsamy died of injuries at the hospital.
title: Three pilgrims killed, seven injured in accident in Tiruverumbur
